system.special: SM Wep, Devastating (2), Concussive (1), Power Field, Tearing, Unwieldy
system.note: Space Marines Only. Master-Crafted Relic Astartes Thunder Hammer of the Aurora Chapter. As with all Astartes Thunder Hammers, increase Unnatural Strength from x2 to x3 for damage purposes.
